title: Kent's Crusade with Joe Kent and Heidi Ganahl
itunes:title: Kent's Crusade with Joe Kent and Heidi Ganahl
description:
The Red Wave is poised to sweep over Arizona, Georgia, and Pennsylvania, but there's no reason to think it will only succeed in swing states. Washington House candidate Joe Kent and Colorado gubernatorial candidate Heidi Ganahl join Charlie to discuss the dramatic GOP momentum nationwide. Plus, Charlie weighs in on Elon Musk's imminent Twitter buyout, and the Biden regime's plan to stop it with claims about "national security."

 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
